pkgmetadata.longdescription: Companion to Applied Linear Statistical Models // Functions and Data set to Accompany Applied Linear Statistical Models Fifth Edition, Michael H. Kutner; Christopher J. Nachtsheim; John Neter; William Li, 2005.(ISBN-10: 0071122214, ISBN-13: 978-0071122214, https://www.amazon.co.uk/Applied-Linear- Statistical-Models-Intl/dp/0071122214) Present the function on the package that does not exist in the R. In this version of the package Chapters 1 to 9 and 16 to 18, have been investigated. In future versions more chapters to be checked.
